title: The Killer Beside Me
resume: Bob Peterson invites himself to his co-workers, Gene and Jaye-Jaye Thurnau's new home to give them a housewarming present. That evening, Jaye-Jaye leaves the guys to run an errand. When she returns, the guys have vanished.
